name: Lemon Breakfast Bread
author: Yo
summary: I was looking for a lemon bread recipe and found several. After several revisions this is the best tasting and moist bread I came up with; it has variations of flavors.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons dried lemon peel (such as Penzey's)
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Stir 1 1/2 cups sugar, applesauce, oil, and eggs together in a bowl; add lemon peel and 1 teaspoon lemon extract
Pour milk into applesauce mixture and stir
Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Add flour mixture to applesauce mixture; stir until well-combined
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until toothpick inserted in the center of the loaf comes out clean, about 75 minutes
Let bread rest in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool
Whisk 1/2 cup sugar, water, and 1/2 teaspoon lemon extract together in a saucepan over medium heat until sugar is melted and has a thick glaze consistency, 1 to 2 minutes
Poke several holes in the top of the warm bread and brush glaze over loaf
